name: Yellow Toad's Classes of Bup and Stuff
name_original: Yellow Toad's Classes of Bup and Stuff
description:
Welcome to Yellow Toad's Classes!

Yellow Toad's Classes in Bup and Stuff is the greatest (and best) edutainment for your kid(s)! Learn how to do simple tasks like learning your animals and...

Ok...

Let's cut the crap right now.

This is just a mod, not an edutainment game...

The Original game is pretty gory and scary sometimes.

but, this was ment to be a little bit dumb and silly.

I can't stop you cuz i'm a fr*cking text on a game page.

So, go on ahead and download the game i guess...

In the year 2025, Yellow Toad is suffering from financial problems due to the lack of sales his game "New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe & Knuckles All Stars HD Remix Reignited feat. Dante from the "Devil May Cry" Series+ Bowser's Minions+ Bowser Jr.'s Journey N Sane Turbo Melee Brawl Ultimate With New Funky Mode." He said "After Spending Billions of dollars on this game and only 4 copies were sold." So, he ran a Kickstarter to spend money on a school. He got plenty of money to make his dream come true. So Yellow Toad granted permission to anyone go to the school early, and you(one of the backers) had the pass to go the school. Can you collect all 22 notebooks? Download this to find out.

Yellow Toad (Duh)

King Dice

Starlow

Jevil

Gotta Sweep ( Or 🅱room)

Remote

Please remember that this is still in the works, so expect unchanged textures and sounds.
